content.detailedDescription: While sitting at a camp fire in the back yard, approx 11:00 pm my wife and i noticed what we thought was the moon through the trees to the east of our location. after less than a minute i noticed it was moving and was not the moon. we moved about 30 feet to a clear view and noticed what appeared to be an orange flare like light. at first i thought maybe it was fireworks. we suddenly realized they were moving through the sky heading north. we followed the lights through the sky. most of the duration they were flashing white lights, but at times would flare like light. it was hard to tell if the flare light and the flashing lights were the same object. they mave have been separate objects. after a minute or so the flashing lights continued north, we no longer could see the flare like lights. we watched the flashing objects continue north until they were too far north and no longer visible. at no time did we hear anynoise!. we went inside and posted on facebook to see if anyone else had seen them. there were responses by people who did see them as well. one in alanson area. approx 10 minutes after seeing the objects i called 911 to see if they had calls about lights in sky. i know the dispatcher and he said they had many calls from petoskey east to cheboygan and petoske north to harbor springs. 911 would have many documented calls as to the same lights. many calls stated the same "flare like" or "sparks". the callers indicated to 911 that they did not make noise. the only craft i could think of that would be similiar is military craft dropping flares, such as anti heat seeker missle flares. why would they do this at night, over n. michigan?
content.summary: 2 object/lights with flare like trail at times. 911 had many calls about these.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were driving home from attending a wedding on saturday, june 30, 2012 in albany, ny over rte 20. when we reached lebanon, ny we turned the corner onto a long stretch of road. there were no other vehicles on the road driving at the time, only a parked rv on the side of the road with all the lights off. the rv was parked about 1/2 mile from where we witnessed the event. 

along this road is lebanon valley speedway which could be seen, but was closed for the evening and dark. other than the street lights by the crossing area. these lights are located about 1/2 mile futher down the road from where we witnessed the phenomenom.

we noticed up in the sky on the opposite side of the road from the speedway, four red/orange orbs hovering above the treeline. they were in a formation of a square, two on top, two below. i could not estimate the distance and height due to the darkness, but they were definately low.

the sky was clear and no clouds could be seen. there was no sound, no blinking lights, and nothing to suggest a conventional aircraft or radio tower. my first thoughts were they were either flares or fireworks.

as we watched the phenomenon, two of the objects suddenly started drifting toward the south, the other two remained stationary.

as we eventually turned the corner at the end of the road, we lost site of the objects due to trees. i wanted to turn around, but again rationalized that they were perhaps flares or some sort of fireworks. 

after pondering what i saw over a few days, i decided to search the internet just to see if there were any other sightings, with the understanding that there are lot of fake reports. however, it appears that there were sightings of these crafts all over ny state as well as all over the world on the same date (june 30, 2012) and all around the same time frame.(10:00pm) which because of the coincidence is the only reason i have filed this report.

i cannot explain what it was, and i am not a ufo buff, but i can tell you what it wasn't. it wasn't an airplane, and it wasn't helicopters. they were too large to be chinese laterns or balloons, and i've never seen fireworks that release large orbs in a square formation and just hover in the sky with no smoke trail.
content.summary: Four red glowing orbs hovering above treetops

content.detailedDescription: i had been taking pictures of storm clouds, i did not see anything until i downloaded these pictures on my computer. does anyone know what this is?
content.summary: I had been taking pictures of  storm clouds, i did not see anything until i downloaded these pictures on my computer. what this is?

content.detailedDescription: I was having coffee on my patio on the north side of my house,when a bright pulsating silvery light streeked from north to south at a speed i have never witnessed before.Thelight was visible for a few seconds before it had traveled out of eyesight.Judging from the light i am only guessing it was about 500 or so feet above the ground. ihave no idea what it was ,i have seen satelites, jet fighters playing war games,falling stars, but i have never seen any thing even close to the speed that this thing was moving,and there wasn't any sound at all.
content.summary: A pulsating light traveling faster than comprehinsable

content.detailedDescription: I was out looking for one of our cats about 11pm and looked up at the stars as i often do and in the constellation of orion i saw a horizontal yellowish flame type light that just seem to appear suddenly. the first thing i thought was- is that a slice of the moon covered partially by clouds? but it was gone as quick as it appeared and left behind at least two small blinking lights which slowly moved east which would ultimately lead to the little traverse bay of lake michigan.
content.summary: Flame colored horizontal object  -night sky

content.detailedDescription:
It was may 4th and i was on a commercial airline heading to o'hare to make a connecting flight to kentucky. for reference, i was sitting at the window on the left side (facing the cockpit) of the plane. while in flight, i was admiring the storm off in the distance when i noticed a peculiar orange light/object moving slowly over the storm. i would estimate that it was at 10:00 and down from where i was at about a 30-35 degree angle. at first i just wrote it off as a plane, even though i could not see the form of it. i reasoned that the distance must have made it look more like a sphere. however, as i observed the object more i became aware that there were no blinking lights. i was further intrigued when the glowing orange object/sphere was at about 7:00-8:00 as it was still bright orange; if what i was seeing were the front lights of an aircraft, then they would be pointed away from the plane i was on and therefore should have changed in luminosity. i also found it strange that this object was very close, almost tracking the lightening/thunderstorm as opposed to avoiding it. it seemed to move at times while at others it seemed to hover. i thought that these movements may just be a matter of misinterpretation of moving around in the plane, but the plane was flying a relatively steady course to o'hare. there may have been other witnesses, but i didn't really care to discuss it with anyone on the plane since i was tired and the object could have been anything.

i want to put a disclaimer that i've grown up having an interest in fringe-science and paranormal experiences, so i have a clear bias of wanting to believe. however, because i rely in the scientific method to establish credibility for such findings, i don't jump to conclusions.
content.summary: Witnessed a glowing orange sphere-like craft above lightening/thunderstorm.

content.detailedDescription: My husband, brother and i were standing in the road helping my mom move.  we happened to notice something flame like flying (it was daylight) in the sky.  we were rather stunned and we were trying to figure out what we saw.  it flew in a line and then turned slightly behind a tree line.  we ran to the back of the house to get a better view and it disappeared.  that same night it was seen again by my mother and niece.  they saw it again last night along w/neighbors on their street.  everyone describes the same type of object  "flying flames".  no sound at all.
content.summary: Spotted a flame like object moving slowly, it turned slightly and vanished behind some trees

content.detailedDescription:
we were waiting to see if the clouds would clear so we could see eclipse. when they appeared we surely were not expecting it. i did not know what to think they were, it surprized me and kinda freaked me out a little.

the orbs just appeared from nothing to a brillant light perfect in shape and were of the same size... the left one was lower on the horizon vs. the right.  after a few seconds of being stationary they started to slowly move together until they joined and disappeared... was very angelic looking against the pink sky... cant explain what we saw and my wife said to me "oh my god what is that!!"... we werent afraid , they seemed to be very far off. i would say they were the size of pencil eraser on the horizon..
content.summary: Clouds covering eclipse, then the 2 orbs appeared in the distance horizon

content.detailedDescription: A very bright (star) blinked out for about 30sec then came back on then minutes later i thought i seen a helicopter or sati light move into position better to observe it, but i may be wrong because the helicopter or sati light stayed in position for at least three hours.
content.summary: What i thought was a star blinked off for about 30sec then came back on.

content.detailedDescription:
I took off alone from an uncontrolled airport in tulsa ok at night in a c-172 to practice maneuvers for my commercial pilot license. it was at night around 11pm. i had the plane at a high angle of attack and low power because i was practicing slow flight. my d.G and vor demonstrated false headings all of a sudden and it concerned me.I am ifr rated and had a visual line of sight to the airport so i banked left to return and land assuming something was wrong with my instruments.I was heading on a 45 degree angle directly to the airport at around 3500 feet. i dipped my right wing to scan for traffic because the c-172 is a high wing aircraft.At the time i had accumulated around 200 hrs of night time flight.

thats when i saw what i can best decribe as a moving star flying at my same descent rate and airspeed at my 3 oclock about 1500 to 2000 feet above me.Initially i thought it had to be some relection from my instruments making a light appear in my window,but the object was clearly there and moving against the still background of stars. i then noticed that my dg was rolling back and forth and that my vor was pointing in the direction of the moving star. i made a right bank and ignored my instruments and made a left bank using situational awareness to gain runway alignment.I noticed when i banked that my vor would still aim at the object.On descent i saw the object shoot up at a high velocity out of sight.I then clicked to light up the ils lights for landing and at this point was very concerned.

on final approach at around 500 feet, the object suddenly shot straight down and appeared at the end of the runway hovering at around 600 to 700 feet.I could not fathom what it was and assumed it was a helicopter or some experimental? i prepared to reconfigure for a touch and go when the object flew in an instant to about 50 to 100 feet directly infront of me in a blink of an eye, and then proceeded to maintain my airspeed and descent rate? it was very bright,around 12-20 feet in diameter,sort of orangy yellow orb.I could feel heat from it.I am -ex airforce and i worked on the flight line and have seen all types of aircraft take off and land. whatever it was , it was not an airplane, it had no fuselage, no wings, ect.I was concerned because the light was so bright that i could not see the runway clearly.It then shot strait up out of site and i landed soon after. when i tied the plane up with my hands shaking my buddy rob, who is also a pilot, ran out and told me he saw the orb also.He said the orb shot at me and circled around my aircraft from top to bottom and then trailed me at a distance of about 50 feet on final desecent and shot straight up at a high velocity and disappeared right before wheels down.I never reported the incident, we just assumed noone would believe us anyway, and rob feared losing his job as a flight instructor for being deemed a nut case.
content.summary: Moving star /orb.

content.detailedDescription: it looked like car head lights enlarge picture and you can see both lights.
content.summary: Loked like car headlingts appeard white but came out colered on foto

content.detailedDescription: On july 7th around 8pm i was having a smoke outside my house looking west towards the beach and noticed a orange orb moving north up the coast line slowly, i often stargaze and at first glance the object was out of place and what i'm use to seeing.  other orbs started to appear with the original one, total of 5 to 7 at the climax of the event stacked in groups of 3's.  i made some phone calls at that point to close friends but was unable to get a wittness my bb was not able to take vid or pics quality sucked i tried.  the event ended with the orbs fading out till all were gone.  there were 2-sets of groups about a 10-15 sec lag between with one last solo orb that ended the sighting. i also feel that last orb was looking at me for a few seconds by the way i was feeling, kinda like we know who you are and be ready.  i have not seen any reports in our area of what i saw i'm sure others saw the event guam is small and they lite up the sky.  i had choices to call the local newspaper tv and even military but decided not to for personal reasons.  on the qestionare above, i have noticed some extra helichopter activity in my area mainly the time of day they are flying around and duration. we have choppers with the military bases in guam but usually they are on a pretty  routine schedule, these guys are out more than before and continue to be flying around at night while i right this.
content.summary: Orange orbs sighting in guam

content.detailedDescription: Omg omg omg. we had 3 or more anomolies tonight. the first was what we thought was a plane but soon realized it was not. it came in on the angle of a plane but we realized it was not blinking like a plane does, it then went straight up in the sky not on an angle as a plane would to gain altitude. we watched as it ascended straight up into the sky then hover for a second then it veered of to the north west before it disappeared.  we were still chatting about that incident which lasted 5 minutes when a big orange red sorta oblong object appeared in the sky very bright, it travelled from north to south ascending into the sky at an even pace. it was about the size of a hot dog bun if held out at arms length. it also dimmed and brightened as  it was travelling across and then went up into the night and disappeared. this incident lasted about 5 minutes in total but we are not done with our story yet, theres more to tell. 5 minutes after that incident the moon came out of no where from the east very low in the sky almost like it came from out of the water, then rose slowly for a bit then picked the pace  up. but the moon does not rise at 1245 am in the evening,nor does it look the color it did, a bright orangish red too. unfortunatly all i  got was some pictures of the moon as the other objects would not show up on my camera. don't know why, but we also seen a few blinking stars that flickered brightly then dimmed they never stopped flickering the whole time we were there. duration of time for flickering and other anomolies 1 hour. my friends also took pics of what they belived to be anomolies but i thought they were building lights. will add the pics i have including an orangish red moon shot to represent the color of the oblong thing we seen. my friends also claimed they seen a beam like a pen light come down from the sky on the 8 th. of july and it appeared to be moving across the water. we we at our local downtown marina for all the incidents reported here.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It was like a plane but did not blink . it also went straight up into the sky at a high altitude then veered south.

it was not blinking like a plane does, it then went straight up in the sky not on an angle as a plane would to gain altitude. we watched as it ascended straight up into the sky then hover for a second content.detailedDescription: I was riding with my mother to take my niece home when i happened to look out the passenger window when i saw lights. i always do this automatically since its normally an airplane or a helicopter. this didn't appear to be either though, as it appeared to not be moving at all and had a strange pattern of lights, almost like a triangle but with a line coming out the top. i couldn't stop thinking about it. when i first saw the object, i immediately thought it was a helicopter of some kind, or a plane, but when it was just hovering, i knew something was off. it appeared to not make a noise, since my mother didn't see it at all, but i couldn't tell because of the music in the car. i was a little panicky when i realized that it most likely wasn't an airplane or a helicopter, but kept it to myself. we lost sight of the object not very long afterwards since we were continuing to drive. on our way back, i did look for the object, but it was gone, no trace of it anywhere in the distance.
content.summary: Strange pattern of lights viewed hovering while driving down a road.

content.detailedDescription: I was in myrtle beach around the 3rd of november, 2011, staying in a beach front hotel top floor. approxyiamately around 10:00pm i was sitting in the balcony having a beer and listening to the ocean sounds of night when suddenly maybe 100 foot away an amber colored light appeared out of no where. it stayed on for maybe five seconds then turn off then back on and off sort of like flashing effect. this lasted probably another 10 seconds then it shut off completely. a few seconds later another amber light appeared just to the left of the first and did the same pattern. the lights were parallel to the beach as if signaling something further south. what transfixed my mind is that i cud see sum detail around the lights as the flashed on and off. it seemed to be mechanical similar to the type of lights u see in studios for photographic and filming lights, the kind that have shutters or lighting supports on all four sides. to me at first i was thinking how could something this big appear out of no where and total silence? and how did they get it up there, maybe 75 feet off the surface of the water, and how did they keep it so stationary? not once did i think it was a ufo because it hadn't hit me yet to realize it. and of course i didn't think ,about my cell phone camera until it was gone. actually i didn't look into this at all until a friend told me south carolina had many amber light sightings around that time.Maybe when i cudnt hear anything due to the ocean? it was close enough for me to hear something. but just silence
content.summary: Just saw amber colored lights appear right in front of me
Unusual objects (lights) in tinley park, illinois night sky on july 8, 2012

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were enjoying the evening air after a thunderstorm. the approximate time was 2203 hours. my wife noticed a bright light in the northwestern part of the sky. the sky was very clear and we were able to discern commercial aircraft at the 35000 elevation mark. the object possessed whitish/yellow lights that pulsated and disappeared intermittently. the object would re-appear every 20-30 seconds in the same spot and i was able to make out a disc like shape. the object then began to shoot out red and green beams on a ninety degree level and then shot multiple beams towards the ground. i then became concerned and phoned the local sheriff's department to have deputy's observe the bizarre scene that we were witnessing. while waiting for the deputies to arrive, we estimated that the object was at least 400-600 feet in diameter. we then observed smaller lights traveling towards the larger object. it should also be noted that we observed no sound coming from the object. two deputies arrived and observed the sky for a couple of minutes. the advised that the would drive to a spot with better visibility. the object appeared briefly and we returned inside. it should be noted that i am a military veteran who has had extensive training in observation. i also have worked in the law-enforcement/security field for the past three years. this is my second encounter with an unknown object in the sky, with the first encounter being much more detailed and closer.
content.summary: We witnessed a large disc-like object that was stationary and shot red beams in the air and towards the ground

content.detailedDescription: I was at home, and could not get to sleep all nite long, so i got up between 5 and 530 am, and went into the kitchen to get a breakfast bar, when i was getting water to drink, i noticed 2 very bright lights in the sky, i went to my sliding glass door to see if i could get a better look. i noticed the lights would flare up and get brighter, especially the larger, i assumed this one was closer because it was sooo bright. the more i watched, i noticed 3-4 small orb type, much smaller than the big ones, they were very hard to see, one had a pulsing red light, that one was more visable than the smaller white ones. the red pulsing one was stationary, off to the lower right side of the large craft. the smaller white was were harder to see, but they were buzzing around the main craft, kind of like bugs around a light. i believe they do exist, so i was not shocked or in disbelief. this is not my first go around with a ufo. i did take a photo, it does show a fairly good picture of the 2 main crafts, but the small orbs don't show up. i watched it for about 10-15 minutes, then went back to bed to try to sleep.
content.summary: There were 2 main craft, and the larger, or closer one i could see small orb type lights swirling around the main craft, there was one orb that had a flashing red light, but the other orbs were just small and white

content.detailedDescription: While out shopping in the lawrenceville/princeton, nj area on july 10, 2012, around 3pm, i was observing the beautiful clouds in the sky.  i felt i had to take a photo of them. i snapped two photos with my cell phone camera: one at 3:04pm and another at 3:06pm both facing north.  after downloading the photos to my computer, i noticed a strangely-shaped, dark object in front of one of the puffy white clouds on the first photo.  the object is not on the second photo.  i did not notice the object in the sky at the time, so i didn't observe any movement or sound.  the camera screen was hard to see in the bright sunlight; i just aimed and snapped.  it was a busy parking lot with lots of car and people activity.  i have no idea what the object was.
content.summary: Object was noticed only after downloading photo from cell phone to computer.

content.detailedDescription: I went out in my backyard and i looked up at the stars but to see one of them was moving slowly like, toward me. i got out my phone but i couldn't get it to turn on it was like it was dead but my battery was fully charged. the object just hovered over my neighbor's house for around 20 minutes and started to sound like a huming sound. i saw a few light's around the craft and then it just left like 1,000 mph. after that i went to bed around 11 p.M. and awoke around 3 a.M. as i went to the restroom and came back, for about 20 minutes i tried falling asleep but then it was like my whole bedroom was blinding, under my bedroom door was like complete white blinding light. i started hearing noises unlike anything i've ever seen. just huming sound and that's all. it lasted for around 5 minutes and it was gone. next morning my phone worked and then that following night, the object was back but it was across my house for around 10 minutes and then it just, flew away.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Just hovered above my neighbor's house then left. hovered for around 20 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were going to work at apx 11 pm. we work at the local post office. we were in different vehicles at the time. the wife was following behind me and i stoped to see the flying noisless massive black triangle with three huge lights on its bottom just above the trees about 300 feet directly in front of me. the craft was at a mans fast pace moving from my left to right. it then stoped, tilted, and flew west at a disapearing speed. we still talk about it. very cool. 

my other incounter was this year and i was outside at the post office taking my break. when a light appeared in the sky like very large stare. the object then moved from a stationary spot from my right to left at a great speed, then stoped dead and disapeard. the next night on the same break the same object in the same place did the same thing. however the sky was very clear and the object after it stoped slowly flickered away as if going through a worm hole, which i believe they get here and back. this is no joke as i and wife are past 60 and have seen many a ornge balls, white balls and huge black triangles to convince us we sure are not the only ones in this universe. very cool.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovering above post office at 11pm triangle, then stoped and gone

content.detailedDescription:
Sometimes i see ufos in the general kc area anyway. but this one happened roughly between 3 in the morning till about 6:30 to 6:45. and these were very clear to the naked eye! somewhat orb-like in nature and sometimes i saw a very clear triangle shape in some of my photos. 

[at least 3 to 4, and probably as much as 6 to 7 total!]

i took some pictures of these things, and i was just in mere awe of looking at these things for well over 3 hours time. it was rather entrancing and even thrilled to see them much closer then i had ever expected! out of about 300 pictures, there was about 4 or 5 that i just could not really explain! another person i know, also had claimed to see these unusual lights/crafts during about 4 in the morning, when he was going to kci airport.

[so roughly about 3 to even 4 hours, these crafts were descending in the air. i want to say, roughly 500 to 4000 feet in the air and ascending upward and at a slight tilting angle.]

i saw them towards the direction of blue springs even though i live in the lee's summit area. they were very low in hovering position till they slowly creeped upward. the lowest one was extremely bright! my pictures probably don't do it too much justice, but i clearly know what i saw!

i saw 2 major crafts in the sky at all times. both were pulsating like a red/blue/green/white/purple/greyish, the lower one was brighter then the other one. [stacked one on top of another, in a sort of zeta reticuli constellation fashion.]

these 2 major crafts had what i would describe as scout ships beside them. [much smaller ships by these bigger ships. the lower one you could clearly see a smaller ship, but they were in a pretty tight formation. adjacent to the bigger ships that resembled fireballs.]

i was also seeing other smaller scout ships fly outward from and towards it, but sometimes they would get closer to the big spaceships. i had to sometimes cross the street just to see them closer-up. but gosh, it was worth it!

i even seen a black helicopter before these spaceships started rising up during the beginnings of my ufo watch! i could hear it more then anything, but i could see it a bit.

but i saw these things both at the end of night and in the beginnings of daybreak! [when the sun started to come out.] they were still glowing intensely bright. no planes ever glow that bright for a constant amount of time, especially hovering for prolonged periods of time like these did. and i know this was not a north star or some airplane either.

this was rather clearly something extraterrestrial in nature. as much as they were just sort of hanging out, probably to charge up their ships until they could make a leap back to their planet[s]! wild stuff! [i know i was not the only one to see these things.]
content.summary: 4 to 6 ufos in the kc area! [near blue springs/lee's summit]

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and i were hanging out on his 3rd floor balcony, facing north. a helicopter was flying by so i looked up at it and as i did i happened to notice a strange orange light in the sky beyond it. i told my friend to check it out, and after about a second he agreed that the light was a strange color. it was almost the same shade of orange as a street light. the lights were flashing in some kind of pattern, but it remained too blurry for us to actually focus on the sequence. we really had no doubt that we were seeing an 'unidentified flying object.'

the craft descended from the north eastern sky for about ten seconds, appeared to hover in what we think was the vicinity of bob hope airport. it then jiggled a little bit, kind of moving randomly in different directions but never very far. after that, it made a sharp movement eastward and made two more sharp turns that resulted in shape like 2 sides of a triangle. it then hovered for a few more seconds, then accelerated in a northern direction as well as upward at about a 45 degree  angle, and eventually faded away. 

we were watching this object so intently that we could not tear ourselves away to grab a video camera. he even said 'get a camera! get a camera!' but i knew my cell phone camera would likely not catch what we were seeing and i did not want to miss it. i also considered that the balcony we were on has a screen on it and that would mess with the focus on the camera. afterwards, we went to turn on the news because we felt that somebody else obviously saw this, but we saw nothing. we called a few friends to tell them what happened. today, we looked up sightings in los angeles and found all these reports about similar colored objects in the last 10 days, so we felt compelled to add a report.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Single orange lit object over ne san fernando valley

content.detailedDescription: I was looking at the moon from my kitchen skylight. i had a parshal glass celing like a green house attached to the kitchen i liven in the country. i saw lights bobbing from the woods across the street. they got brighter and brighter. i heard no noise as it approched my house. i saw a large light t looked like a sm plane. but then it hovered over my roof as i looked up i saw landing geer but it hovered for 15 sec unlike a plane. then i freaked out. went to bed a hour later and i then had a horriable dream.. in the dream i was in teh same spot i was in the kitchen.. but as i looked up to the glass celing i saw a reflection of a whiteish figure standing behind me a small human like being. the eyes were big and it had a whitish shine or  suit on and it was a dull glowing suit the looked like it was moist or wet. i got scared in the dream and saw my 2 labs laying on the living room floor they were asleep. i yelled for them and stomped my feet and they wouldnt wake up. my dogs always wake up when i call for them.. then i woke up.. i have had dreams like this were i was in a ship with 6 fingered ppl. human like with bright eyes and dark hair. all i remember was the ship was strangely cold and the wall were almost breathing.. but i saw earth out the ship window and the man in the control seat took me home, he spoke to me with little worrds or a thought all i remember was he let me know it was time to go home. oh and there were a lot of other peole there. like little kids and farmers or truck drivers. i am typo 0 negitive blood and so is my dad we both have these storys but my dad was stripped naked and left in a corn field when he was 17. i think they have been following me for years... my x husband worked at nasa and the pentagan and he said the navy knows they are here and there is a portal that opens up on earth (more than 1) and ships/enitys come thru.. i think its opens when there is a full moon. my cousin was a navy seal for 20 years he was really high up and he was killed ( no accident) last year.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Somethin hovering over my kitchen. i had a glass celing in my kitchen.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my husband was going to get our son from his mothers we pulled up and i told him i wasnt going in for him to go get our son it was dark around 9pm and i was setting there in the suv i looked straight ahead and i saw across the field in front of me above the trees 3 lights in a triangle formation 1 would blink red then another then another then one would blink white then another then another they were stationary setting above the trees they did this for about 4 minutes then one started coming towards me but to my left then another went in a straight line behind it then the last one followed and they flew off and i didnt see them anymore i told my husband when he came out but he didnt believe me he says if god made any other beings they wouldnt come here like we cant go there
content.summary: i saw 3 lights in a triangle formation

content.detailedDescription: Just about dusk time, was called outside by friend, looked up and saw this disc just above the tree line, was flying slow enough for me to run under the disc.  saw the underside was jet black, with no exhaust, not a sound coming from vehicle.  moved away down the driveway and went over the freeway and hung a leftand proceeded up over the freeway.  was going at a slow speed.  was blinking a red dome light at top of disc.  proceeded about 4 miles to the east and returned back to my vicinity.  about 2 miles away just flew around that neiborhood.  lasted about 2 hrs.  i called the air force base, but was denied any info.    when it left, which was extremely fast just flew straight up and was gone.
content.summary: Flew right over my apt.  was just above a very tall palm tree two other saw this with me.

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo  case  report


march 31, 2012:  orb  and  plasma  cylinder

	on saturday, march 31, 2012, my wife and i also saw two different objects in the corner of the first floor of our house.  

	at approximately 7 am that day, our dog barked and she went to bring him outside.  when she went downstairs, she saw a glowing  orb with a dome top and flat bottom.  it was approximately 2 ft in width and 1.5 ft in height.  the object had two vertical lights inside which blinked green pulsating light.  facing the object, on our left side, bottom part, the object emitted bursts of very bright white light, some long and some short.  the object was located near a corner wall and appeared to be floating about 5 feet off the ground.  

	my wife started to pray and started to telepathically talk with the object.  my wife thought it was some kind of heavenly angel.  the object seemed to respond by emitting the white bursts and more blinking of the green lights.  she was grabbing our dog at the time, and our dog had just had a stroke and was walking in a paralyzed fashion--  limping to one side real bad and falling down as she walked.  my wife asked if her dog can be cured.  the lights then began to blink a lot.

	after 15 minutes of observing and communicating with this object, she started to yell for me to come downstairs.  i ignored her cause it was saturday morning and i did not sleep well the night before and wanted to sleep.  after 5 minutes of her yelling she came up and finally told me what she had seen.  i first went to the bathroom and then downstairs.  i was very skeptical.  

	when i got downstairs, we did not see the orb but a small cylinder shaped object which i am calling a plasma cylinder.  



	the object did not appear to have edges but seemed like a fluid object with constant movement inside and on the edges of the object.  inside were multi-colored lights similar to plasma.  each color was not unique and separate like a rainbow but more meshed like colored water and the water colors are constantly mixing.  it seemed to be full of energy with colors floating stationary in the air.  the plasma object appeared to be about 1 ft in length and 6 in height.  it was about 5 feet off the ground near the same corner wall that the orb was previously seen.  the object then went directly through our wall to go outside.  i only saw the plasma cylinder object for about 2 minutes before it disappeared through our wall.  

	attach is a picture of the  domed orb and the plasma cylinder.  we are also attaching a picture of our corner wall.  please note that the orb/plasma object appeared between the left wall and the flower picture.

	our corner wall is on the western corner of our house.  at 7 am that corner is dark because light does not enter that corner.  we have also closed drapes on the western window as well and that part was dark because the sun was just rising on the east side.  we know what we saw and it was not an illusion.

	also note that we were going to put our dog to sleep in a few days before this incident--  she could barely move and was walking sideways and constantly falling down.  after the orb left, our dog did not appear to have any symptoms of the stroke--  she was walking perfectly fine.  she is still sick but she now walks fine.  we were freaked out by this.  many of our friends saw the difference in her walk and we told them what had happened.


 

may 6, 2012:  approximately  8-10  orange orbs 
	              and 2 black helicopters

	on saturday, may 6, from approximately 9-9:20 pm, i and about 6 other witnesses saw approximately 8-10 orange orbs in apopka, florida.  the witnesses were myself, my wifes brother, my wifes father, 2 other adults, and a teenager.  

	we were attending the high school graduating ceremony of my wifes nephew who was graduating from forest lake academy in apopka, florida.  the lengthy graduation ceremony was almost finishing and i wanted to get some air and stepped outside of the auditorium.  we were located on a small hill about 300 feet north of state road 436 just west of state road 434.  thus, the orbs were very close, about 300 feet away, and the visibility was excellent.  

	all of the witnesses began to see bright yellow orbs rising from approximately the interchange of road 436 and 434 from about tree level.  we could not see them coming from the ground but appeared to pop out at the tree level.  they appeared to travel in a westerly direction along road 436 just south of it.  the orbs appeared about every 1-2 minutes.   most were uniform in direction and most went west and upwards slowly, i would guess at 10-20 mph.  some began to float straight up and others moved faster (30-40 mph) than others.  

	the orbs then became distant and disappeared.  this lasted from approximately 9 pm to about 9:20 pm.  about 10 minutes later, two black helicopters came zooming in at a fast rate.  they stopped on top of route 436 just south of bear lake road (about  mile from where we were).  they stayed there about 10-15 minutes and then left.  the orbs had disappeared when they arrived.  

	orb description:  difficult to describe but they appeared to be the size of a small volkswagen in the air.  they were round in shape, bright orange color.  light was self contained in object and not emitted outwards.  i thought they might have been chinese lanterns but i have never seen a chinese lantern before.  but now after all of our recent sightings, i am having a second opinion.  

	attached is a map of forest lake academy and location of orb movements.


 

july 8, 2012:  large craft

	on july 8, 2012, at approximately 3:30 am, my wife saw a huge craft, about the size of a football field, maybe double that size, about 1/2 mile from our house.  we live in the killian area of miami and our best estimate is that the craft was near or above the miami zoo.  

	our dog is very sick and throwing up and she went to open the door in front of our house so the dog can go to the bathroom.  when she looked up, in a south-westerly direction, she saw the craft at approximately a 45 degree angle.  

	attached is a drawing of the craft made by my wife.  it was shaped like a cylinder but with pointed edges on both sides which appeared triangular shaped on each end.   the right and left sides, inside the triangle portion of the edges, had two large bands of extremely bright multi-colored lights on each side.  the middle part of the craft appeared very light whitish or grey colored.  

	the craft made an extremely loud noise, much more powerful than if an airplane was standing directly above us.  the object remained stationary for about 5 minutes and then it disappeared. 

	we have attached a drawing of the object, a map showing the location of our house and the location of the miami zoo area, and a weather chart indicating that the visibility was 10 miles, and that there were scattered clouds at 3:30 am that night.  my wife said that she saw many stars in the sky that night and thus she had excellent visibility.  






 

summary

	previous to these events, my wife and i have never seen ufos or other similar objects in our life.  

	she is not bothered by this because she is very religious thinks that they were a messenger from god.  i, on the other hand, have been freaked out.  i started doing research on the subject, have joined mufon, ordered about 30 ufo books, listen daily to coast to coast, etc, etc.  i never even knew that these radio programs or ufo organizations existed.   i am now consumed by the subject.  i need to find some answers and some closure because my wife says that i became obsessed with this issue.  

	finally, i am an attorney with the irs in miami, fl and my wife was trained as a physical therapist and is a stay-at-home mom.  we live in a very nice upper middle class neighborhood in the killian area of miami, florida.  we have lead normal dull lives until recently.  should you need assistance, you can contact me at my home address and cell number.  thank you.
content.summary: 300 - 600 foot long craft with triangles on ends and mult-colored light bands on triangle part

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i live in a home that sits very high on a ridge.  it's largely fields all around,so we know well the usual lights we see every night. the night of july 9th, 2012, my wife went to get something out of her car around 10:45, and noticed 2 hovering lights a few miles due south in the distance.  the lights were definitely out of place and interesting, and seemed to hover for 3 or 4 minutes in the same place (one a little higher and to the right of the other), and then both slowly descended below the distant horizon at what seemed to be a synchronized descent. if there were any sound, i would've thought it was 2 helicopters searching for something, but there was no sound, and two helicopters wouldn't be a common occurence either (and we didn't see any news stories referencing any searches).

we tried to break out my son's telescope to get a closer look, but we're not very telescope savvy, and the descent below the horizon came a little too quick.

nothing crazy or scary about the incident, we were just curious if anyone else had seen anything similar, as we were left saying, "huh?, that was interesting" :).
content.summary: 2 glowing lights, slow descent

content.detailedDescription: I was going to airport to pick up my husband. i turned onto 6th ave and drove a half a block when i seen two of the objects, i pulled the car over and parked got out my cell phone to take pictures.I got out of the car and took some pictures, the objects went slowly across the sky then paused for a second then started to go up higher they turn to red dots the farther from me.There was a man and his children getting his mail at the mail box in front of my car i heard the little girl say daddy look at that but i did't talk to them i was taking pictures then they left when the two objects disappeared. then as i was getting back in my car and over my shoulder i seen like a fire ball object coming torge me, i got out of the car again and took a few pictures but the object was getting to close and i was afraid i would get burned so i got in my car and slowly drove south on 6th ave and watched the third object do the same as the other two pause and go up to the same spot and disappear. when i got to the corner of 17th street two teenagers where on the corner and i asked them if they seen the things and said ya what was that i said i didn't know but there were three of them the afro-american boy said three,i guess they didn't see the first two,then he ssked if i was falling the objects  i told he no i was going to the airport to pick up my husband, the boy asked where my husband was coming in from i told him mississippi then he said wow is it hot down there. with that i drove to the airport.When my husband and i arrived home my husband transfered the pictures to the computer and we printed the awesome pictures. i took the pictures to the newspaper in town and sent copies to ken at the reflector newspaper. p.S. unable to send copies right now
content.summary: Looked as thought they  where on fire
